alert.note: Alert for Calvert; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 8:17PM EDT until June 08 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Marys County in southern Maryland... Central Calvert County in southern Maryland... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 816 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Golden Beach, or 9 miles east of Popes Creek, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Prince Frederick, Hallowing Point, Breezy Point, Sheridan Point, Flag Harbor, Golden Beach, Saint Leonard, Huntingtown, Long Beach, Mechanicsville, Charlotte Hall, Aquasco, Calvert Beach, Benedict, Barstow, Port Republic, Sandgates and Dares Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
